name: CardiacSurgery
title: Cardiac Surgery
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent cardiac surgery.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Procedure.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with cardiac surgery.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
